channel.title: Crowdfunding Collection #195, including every tabletop rpg project started between 03/29 and 04/24
channel.description: I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #195, including every tabletop rpg project started between 03/29 and 04/24. Due to my procrastination the collection sees quite a lot of projects. Of all the projects „The Dark Quarter“ stood out to me. The game is a mix of a boardgame and a gamebook/ttrpg focussing on New Orleans centered urban fantasy. Very cool and great looking, am in! item.title: Crowdfunding Collection #195, including every tabletop rpg project started between 03/29 and 04/24
item.dc:creator: @Teylen
item.description:
@Teylen wrote:

I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #195, including every tabletop rpg project started between 03/29 and 04/24.

Due to my procrastination the collection sees quite a lot of projects. Of all the projects „The Dark Quarter“ stood out to me. The game is a mix of a boardgame and a gamebook/ttrpg focussing on New Orleans centered urban fantasy. Very cool and great looking, am in!

English Crowdfundings

6 Roleplaying Games
3 Contemporary Roleplaying Games
6 Fantasy Roleplaying Games
3 Cyberpunk Roleplaying Games
2 SciFi Roleplaying Games
2 Card-System Roleplaying Games
1 Hybrid Roleplaying Game
1 Larp Rulebook
2 Settings
2 D&D 5E Settings
5 Sourcebooks

4 D&D & X Sourcebooks
8 D&D 5E Sourcebooks
6 Adventures

3 Accessoires
5 Deck of Cards

2 Plushies
3 Various RPG Projects

French Crowdfundings

Ended & Cancelled Projects
